mapper.insert: insert into tb_article (article_id, article_title, article_link, article_platform, article_category, article_descript, article_body, article_image, create_time, update_time) values (#{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articlePlatform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleDescript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_article set article_title = #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_link = #{articleLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_platform = #{articlePlatform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, article_category = #{articleCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, article_descript = #{articleDescript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_body = #{articleBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_image = #{articleImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select article_id, article_title, article_link, article_platform, article_category, article_descript, article_body, article_image, create_time, update_time from tb_article where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select article_id, article_title, article_link, article_platform, article_category, article_descript, article_body, article_image, create_time, update_time from tb_article

select ta.article_id, ta.article_title, ta.article_link,ta.article_descript, ta.article_body, ta.article_image, tp.platform_name from tb_article ta,tb_platform tp where ta.article_platform = tp.platform_id
